name: InsuranceBureau
title: Insurance Bureau
description: Rating bureaus and advisory organizations that develop classification systems, rate filings, and standardized forms.

concept.definition: Insurance Services Office — develops standardized policy forms, rates, and classification systems for property and casualty lines.
National Council on Compensation Insurance — provides classification, rating, and data services for workers' compensation.
American Association of Insurance Services — an advisory organization offering standardized forms and loss costs for property and casualty lines.
SURF Advisory Organization — provides advisory services for surplus lines and specialty markets.
Insurance Bureau of Canada — the national industry association providing advisory rates, forms, and data services for the Canadian market.
Groupement des assureurs automobiles — the body that administers automobile statistical plans and rating in Québec.
